name: Black Box (bumblebeary)
description:
In this visual novel, Demi wakes up during a work conference only to discover that her coworkers may have a pretty big secret, big enough to warrant renting out a big black box tent. Ever-determined, she decides to find out what exactly the company, and her future hold.

To be honest, this game is really about coming to terms that we're all doing the best that we can. Whether big or small, we can make each other's worlds a better place. I know my art could improve, but I wanted to try doing all aspects of the story at least once. Constructive criticism, compliments, and fan art always welcome ^-^

It's about 19k words, 4 different endings (one of which is after the first choice, pretty straightforward. There is one optional romance route and some dark themes, but there's quite a bit of humor as well. If you can't get voice acting to come up, play with the Voice Sustainable option in the preferences and the volume control.
